findings.title: Unoptimized method claimTokens in TokenDistributor
findings.description: The method claimTokens in TokenDistributor needs to do a few checks before it can distribute the tokens and can be simplified and optimized by removing unused methods and internal calls.

findings.title: Unused structure Claim
findings.description: The structure Claim can be removed because it’s not used anywhere else in the code.

findings.title: Method hashMatch can be removed and its contents moved into parent method
findings.description: The method hashMatch can be removed because it’s only used once and the contents can be moved directly into the parent method.
